title: Wall Street Breakfast, April 16th: Syria Tensions Hit Russian Stocks, Boost Defense Stocks
author: Seeking Alpha

description: Today’s top stories: The Russian market opened lower amid tensions over Syria; the U.S.-led strikes may have given a boost to defense stocks; and Netflix is up heading into earnings. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
